useCases.label: What use-cases are you building agents for?

reasons.label: What makes you interested in Letta?

discord.title: Get support via Discord
discord.description: Join our Discord server to get help from the community and Letta devs:

DeleteAccountSection.title: Delete account
DeleteAccountSection.description: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone. This will delete any organizations you are the sole member of. Those organizations will have all their projects, agents, data sources, and other data deleted as well.

DeleteAccountDialog.title: Delete account
DeleteAccountDialog.error: There was an error deleting your account, please try again or contact support.
DeleteAccountDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This is permanent and cannot be undone. If you are the sole member of any organizations, they will be deleted as well.

confirmCheckbox.label: I understand the consequences of deleting this account
confirmCheckbox.error: You must confirm that you understand the consequences of deleting your account

organization/environment-variables.title: Environment variables
organization/environment-variables.description: Manage environment variables for your organization. All environment variables are scoped to the organization and are available to all agents in the organization via tools. Keys cannot be read after being set.

integrations.composio: This environment variable is tied to the Composio integration, for more information click this badge

organization/environment-variables.errorMessage: There was an error loading environment variables, please try again or contact support.

key.error: Keys must be alphanumeric and underscores only

DisconnectIntegrationDialog.title: Remove Composio integration
DisconnectIntegrationDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove the Composio integration? This will remove your API key from our system, but it will not remove any tools you have added to your agents, this may break some agent's ability to function properly.
DisconnectIntegrationDialog.error: There was an error removing the Composio integration, please try again or contact support.

SetApiKeyDialog.title: Set API key
SetApiKeyDialog.error: There was an error setting the API key, please try again or contact support.

usage.description: To use composio in your agents, visit any agent template, press the + icon in the tools section, and you will see all available Composio tools in the tool explorer

configuration.description: Composio requires an API key to add tools to your agents. You can configure your API key below
configuration.create: To create an API key, <link>visit this page</link>.
configuration.hidden: You cannot see the api key once set

organization/integrations/composio.title: composio
organization/integrations/composio.description: Composio allows your team to connect your agents to external services and APIs without writing any code. You can use Composio to create custom integrations, automate workflows, and more.

disconnect.title: Remove integration
disconnect.description: Are you sure you want to remove this integration? This will remove all configuration and usage data for this integration.

composio.title: Composio

ADE/Welcome.title: Welcome to the Letta ADE!
ADE/Welcome.message: The Letta ADE is where you can create, customize and deploy your agents. You can even arrange the windows to suit your workflow, just drag the tabs.
ADE/Welcome.more: Right now you are in a template called <templateName></templateName>. You can customize this template in many ways, here are a few things you can do:
ADE/Welcome.editMemoryBlocks: Edit your template's <editCoreMemoriesButton></editCoreMemoriesButton> and customize who your agent is and who it talks to.
ADE/Welcome.editDataSources: Attach <editDataSourcesButton></editDataSourcesButton> to your template so your agent can look up information from external sources.
ADE/Welcome.simulate: Use the <agentSimulatorButton></agentSimulatorButton> to test talking to a deployed agent
ADE/Welcome.exploreArchivalMemories: Explore the <archivalMemoriesButton></archivalMemoriesButton> of your agents (see what your agents have learned).
ADE/Welcome.evenMore: When you're ready to create agents from your template, you can visit the <templateVersionButton></templateVersionButton> and create a new version of your template, then follow the instructions on that page to deploy your agents.

login/LoginComponent.title: Sign in to Letta Cloud
login/LoginComponent.terms: By clicking the button above, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

data-sources/files/page.title: Source Files
data-sources/files/page.error: There was an error loading files, please try again or contact support.
